mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=REAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_id = #{creatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delete_state = #{deleteState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, member_name, tel, nick_name, head_img, rate, status, create_date, update_date, pwd, signature, creat_id, delete_state from member where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, member_name, tel, nick_name, head_img, rate, status, create_date, update_date, pwd, signature, creat_id, delete_state from member
